abstract: Walt Disney has a fairly strong grip on Marvel Entertainment, judging from the many buyer-friendly provisions in the the $4 billion merger agreement.
snippet: Walt Disney has a fairly strong grip on Marvel Entertainment, judging from the many buyer-friendly provisions in the the $4 billion merger agreement.
lead_paragraph: Monday’s announcement that Walt Disney will acquire Marvel Entertainment for about $4 billion has deal junkies salivating because of the players involved.Reporters and analysts have also been speculating furiously about the potential synergies from this combination of two character-licensing machines, although Disney’s opportunities in the short term may be hampered by Marvel’s current distribution and licensing deals.

headline.main: Disney’s Firm Grip on the Hulk
